name: Field Clashers
description:
Build your best 11 from your favourite team.
Carefully choose your formation and tactics to outwit your opponents.
Watch as your team battles it out to try and win!

Tournament Mode
Take your team into a winner-takes-all tournament, where you must take 4 successive victories to lift the cup.
Do you have what it takes to lead the last team standing?

Single Match
Refine your tactics in a one-off match against another side.
Find what makes your team tick and how to win!

Online play
Test your skills against an online opponent, either in a tournament contest or single match.
Or, match-up against a friend and battle for the bragging rights!

Offline play
Take your team anywhere with you and match up against the AI
Choose your opponent and find their weakness!
